did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Proofs of Works by James Baldwin, Charles Wright and Imamu Amiri Baraka
1965-1978
did.physdesc: This collection consists of three items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Proofs of works by Baldwin, Charles Wright and Imamu Amiri, Baraka, Accession # 10880, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items were purchased by the Library from the William Reese Company, New Haven, Connecticut, on October 27, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three uncorrected advance proofs of fiction works by three Black American authors: James Baldwin (1924-1987), Imamu Amiri Baraka (LeRoi Jones, b. 1934), and Charles [Stevenson] Wright (b. 1932). (Copies of these books are available in Alderman Library.)

did.unittitle: Uncorrected Proofs. James Baldwin, Going To Meet The Man(New York: The Dial Press) 1965
Uncorrected Proofs. Charles Wright, The Wig: A Mirror Image(New York: Farrar, Strauss and Giroux) 1966
Uncorrected Advance Proofs. [Imamu] Amiri Baraka (LeRoi Jones), The Motion of History and Other Plays(New York: William Morrow and Company, Inc.) 1978
